name: City Defender (Don Kyniu)
description:
That's one of my first games ever made in Unity. Gameplay is similar to Missle Command Game made by Atari. So, basically, you need to destroy enemy rockets before they will reach the city(houses next to your air defence). You can allow 3 rockets to explode. If 4 will reach it's goal, the game is over.

It's an infinite type of game.

And also while I was playing that game before i upload it there, I noticed, that there is a big difficulty spike from easy to very hard and sometimes even impossible(waves of rockets and your firerate is very limited, so you either need be lucky or very quick)

But  in this game first time I was fiddling around with rotations and mouse input.  And the game window is not covering entire screen space in full screen, because I believe, that I've not setted up a proper resolution there. So the main game window is in the center.
